title: Paris police chase over running of red light ends in pileup | DW News
description: Paris police chase over running of red light ends in pileup. A car chase in Paris has ended in a crash. Police were pursuing a driver who'd run a red light but lost control of their vehicle, colliding with two others. The officers are now in hospital with serious injuries.

title: Elon Musk finalizes Twitter acquisition after months of negotiations
description: Billionaire entrepreneur Elon Musk has finally completed his acquisition of Twitter, ending a months-long saga that saw multiple legal battles and fluctuating share prices. The deal was finalized at the original offering price of $54.20 per share.

title: New York Times reports record digital subscription growth
description: The New York Times Company announced today that it has surpassed 10 million digital subscribers, a significant milestone for the newspaper as it continues its digital transformation. The company attributes this growth to its expanded coverage in areas like technology, climate, and global politics.

title: Latest iPhone unveiling draws record viewership
description: Apple's latest iPhone unveiling event has broken all previous viewership records, with over 100 million people tuning in to the livestream. The new device features breakthrough AI capabilities and a revolutionary camera system that experts say could redefine mobile photography.

title: Major breakthrough in quantum computing announced by IBM
description: IBM researchers have announced a significant breakthrough in quantum computing, developing a new qubit architecture that dramatically reduces error rates. This advance could accelerate the timeline for practical quantum computing applications in fields like cryptography, materials science, and drug discovery.

title: Champions League final set after dramatic semi-finals
description: The UEFA Champions League final matchup is now set following two dramatic semi-final second legs. Both matches went to extra time, with last-minute goals determining the finalists. Football experts are already calling it one of the most exciting Champions League tournaments in recent memory.
